activities: Management of clinical trials for global medical device companies. Intelemage manages the medical image aspects of clinical trials being performed including the acquisition and staging of medical images for review.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Clinical Trial Data, Commercial Medical Imaging Data, Commercial Medical Device Operations Data
recoursemech: Any questions or concerns regarding Intelemage’s use or disclosure of personally identifiable data under this policy should be directed to Intelemage’s Director of Quality Assurance. We will investigate and attempt to resolve complaints and disputes in accordance with the principles contained in this policy. If we are unable to mutually resolve such a complaint, Intelemage has agreed to participate in the dispute resolution procedures of the applicable national EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) or Swiss FDPIC to resolve disputes pursuant to the Safe Harbor Principles.
